name: Baldi Education School Basics
description:
Baldi Basic Education & Learning in School is a baldi learning game where you will polish your learning skills. You get admission in baldi school where baldi is a cruel teacher who punish students if they had mistake. In the first day of baldi school your friend lost his books in the school and you promised him to find it for him
If I want to get books I have to pass some tests.

So help your friend to save him from baldi

Features for Baldi
- Amazing School learning enviroment
- High Quality graphics
- Addictive sound effects

Download Fun For Free!
